short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: (Search Faster) TeleSearch gets your search results from the top sites and search engines quicker than before

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
*** YES! your üîésearch experienceüîç can get better ***

1. Search ‚ö° faster, explore additional search options and even compare your search results.

2. Do a ‚ö° direct search on the top sites from any webpage you're on (TeleSearch)

3. No-Type Search with the Select Search (don't just imagine it give it a try.)

-----
‚ö°
Quickly Search from the top 15+ search providers and sites directly.

----
*** üìñ How to Use ***
Direct Search
1. Right-Click Mouse button and select the TeleSearch option.
2. Type your search query.

Select Search
1. Select text from a webpage then right-click the mouse button and select a search provider or type the site shortcut.

‚ö°
TeleSearch extension simplifies your search experience by allowing you to search with the top search engine and sites directly from any webpage by utilising site shortcuts.


How to Use the TeleSearch Extension.
1. Check the available sites and type the site shortcut you wish to use.
2. Input the search query then press ENTER key on your keyboard.


The Current Way of Searching
Searching online follows some several steps which might go as follows; 
1. Typing the name of the website e.g (pinterest) on the search bar.
2. Visiting the website at (pinterest.com) waiting for it to load then typing your search query e.g (decor ideas) in the site's search bar.
3. Waiting for the results to show. 

With TeleSearch you can see how searching becomes way faster.
